    test_case = int(input())

for _ in range(test_case):
    floor = int(input())
    ho = int(input())

    list_a = [x for x in range(1,ho+1)]

    for i in range(floor):
        for j in range(1, ho):
            list_a[j] += list_a[j-1]
        
    print(list_a[-1])
